original_title: 1974 (or: Zellion Hadrax IV and the mystery of the extradimensional towers)
overview: In a universe where history has been ravaged by time-travelling criminals, federal agent Zellion Hadrax IV travels to 1970s England, tasked with hunting them down.
tagline: WHO CAN YOU TRUST IF NOT YOURSELF?
title: 1974 (or: Zellion Hadrax IV and the mystery of the extradimensional towers)
